title: Send in the Boomers
author: VD
content_html:
Clearly all that is required in South Africa to avert horrific racial violence is for some Boomers to explain to South Africans that there is just one race, the human race:

A South African opposition figure has warned of impending civil unrest in the continent’s richest country and likened it to ‘an Arab Spring.’ The controversial opposition leader Julius Malema spoke of the country waking up one day with ‘very angry people that are not going to be reasonable.’

Discontent with the ruling African National Congress (ANC) party in South Africa is at all-time high levels due to the social conditions within the country and ‘the poor becoming poor,’ according to Malema.

‘When the unled revolution comes… the first target is going to be white people,’ Mr Malema told the BBC’s Hardtalk programme, adding that the uprising would also target ‘black elites.’

It’s fascinating to observe how, outside of the USA and Western Europe, absolutely no one believes one single word of all the racial equality nonsense that the subjects of the neoliberal world order take as the inerrant Word of Science. For example, in Latvia, people of Russian descent are not even allowed to become citizens.
